headline: How Verisk Analytics’ New Claims Solutions President (VRSK) May Reshape Its Data and AI Ambitions
summary: On February 9, 2026, Verisk Analytics appointed former EY-Parthenon senior partner Steven Kauderer as president of its Claims Solutions business, ending CFO Elizabeth Mann’s interim leadership of the unit. Kauderer’s deep consulting background in insurance transformation and claims efficiency positions Verisk to further develop data- and AI-driven tools that support faster, more accurate claims handling for insurers. Next, we’ll examine how Kauderer’s appointment to lead Claims Solutions may...
